headline: Is PepsiCo, Inc. (PEP) the Best Halal Dividend Stock to Invest In Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Halal Dividend Stocks To Invest In. In this article, we are going to take a look at where PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) stands against the other halal dividend stocks. Halal stocks are shares in companies that adhere to Shariah law. These companies operate in accordance with Islamic principles, […]
